About the Company: Blue Blends (India) Ltd. is engaged in the manufacture of denim.The company offers a wide range of products like Classic Denim, Ring or Silky Denim,Dobby/Fancy Denim,Structured Denim,Amslur Slub Denim,Ring Slub Denim,Elastane Denim,Multitwist Slub Denim and Multi Count Denim.The company is also planning to make new investments and strategies to grow faster than the Indian textile industry.
